short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We could all use a little Pick Me Up. Made by Snacks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You make my heart smile. You are magic. You have the voice of an angel...

Pick Me Up is the fun and free browser extension that will bring a smile to your face. The world is a crazy and scary place right now. Everyone could use a little Pick Me Up. Made by Snacks Studio.

Whenever you open the extension you will be greeted with a compliment that will bring you a little bit of joy. Hit the spacebar or click the button to get another.

Visit pickmeup.madebysnacks.com for more
